transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Vermillion Patron's Top Hat

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 700,753 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 305,117.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

spells.description: Use: Gain 4,362 Parry and 3,102 Avoidance for 6 sec, after which you emit a shockwave in front of you that deals 72,666 Physical damage. (30 Sec Cooldown)

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 700,753 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 305,117.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 93,982 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.
Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 373 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,117 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.

name: Loamm Niffen Tabard
description: Give the Niffen a reason to call you smelly.
